name: SovietEscape.exe
description:
This is my first game I have made. Its great fun for like 10 minutes when you are bored and you wanna have a bit of light hearted fun :)

THIS GAME IS VERY DEMANDING AND I HAVE NO CLUE WHY - also the high score is broken and it shows my high score from UE4
